title: Singles 2-Triple Trouble [Bonzai + Booster + Special Items + Mor
description:
Singles 2: Triple Trouble is a video game by Rotobee and published by German company Deep Silver in 2005. Only three characters are ever in the same household. The aim of the game is to get two of them from being casual acquaintances through to having a sexual relationship. There are several characters of either sex with the possibility for a gay/lesbian relationships as well. Another add-on was the ability to visit a nightclub for meeting other singles kiss.

No need to go through internet forums for installing patches, booster, bonzai, .. Just follow the steps from "Instructions.txt" and enjoy one of the best adult game.
